title: Adult Tech Consumer (30-45)
profile: I am a working adult between 30 and 45 years old. I use mobile and web apps every day for banking, shopping, productivity, and communication. I value speed, low friction, and clear pricing. I avoid products that require long setup or repeated manual tasks.
age_demography: 30-45 years old, urban and suburban, full-time working professionals
tech_savviness: Medium to high. Comfortable trying new apps but expects intuitive UX.

title: Small Business Owner (35-55)
profile: I run a small business and make software purchase decisions myself. I care about ROI, onboarding time, and support responsiveness. I need tools my team can adopt quickly without dedicated IT resources.
age_demography: 35-55 years old, SMB owners or operators
tech_savviness: Medium. Practical user focused on outcomes over features.
product_context: B2B SaaS operations and workflow tools

title: Student Mobile-First User (18-24)
profile: I am a student and I mostly use mobile apps. I compare options quickly and switch if an app feels slow or confusing. I have limited budget and prefer free tiers with clear value.
age_demography: 18-24 years old, college and early-career users
tech_savviness: High on mobile usage, low patience for complexity.
product_context: Consumer apps with freemium business models
